TextView.android:text: Its shoots Have Long been used in many traditional medicines to treat conditions like dropsy and irritable bowel syndrome.
Its shoots are also rich in the B-comples group of vitamins such as thismin, riboflavin, niacin, vitamin B-6(pyridoxicne),and pantothenic acid.
Fresh asparagus also contains fair amounts of antioxidant vitamins such as vitamin-C, Vitamin-A, and vitamin-E
Asparagus is UNSAFE to use in medicinal amonunts during pregnacy.Asparagus extracts have been used for birth control they might tarm hormone balances during pregncy.
Impressive anti-inflammatory properties and high levels of antioxidants make it a good preventive food.
Asparagus is also used for preveting stones in the kidney and bladdes and anemia due to folic deficiency.
Some people apply asparagus directly to the skin for cleaning the face, drying sores, and treating acne.
Asparagus spears are eaten as a vegetable.This can produce a pungent odor in the urine.
